ISSUE.TITLE: Invalid certificate for restcountries.eu
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The SSL certificate for restcountries.eu is issued for shortener.secureserver.net making requests fail. Please update your certificate.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Restore HKG, ALA and change Kosovo Restoring Hong Kong and Aland as before. Kosovo does not yet have an official code, but UNK seems more accepted/used compared to KOS

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Inform about end of support for restcoutries.eu Add easy to find information to readme, quoted from issues #251 (https://github.com/apilayer/restcountries/issues/251#issuecomment-927350169), #252 (https://github.com/apilayer/restcountries/issues/252#issuecomment-927350644) and #253 (https://github.com/apilayer/restcountries/issues/253#issuecomment-927365706)
